how_to_play_text:
How to Play:

1. Join a game (Anonymous or Group)
2. Wait for players to join
3. When game starts, you'll receive your cards
4. Make your decisions: Fold, Check, Call, Bet, or Raise
5. Win pots by having the best hand!

Good luck! üçÄ
